thread.title: NYFW creator wary of celebs who want to enter fashion world | Page Six
thread.title_full: NYFW creator wary of celebs who want to enter fashion world | Page Six

author: Tashara Jones
title: NYFW creator wary of celebs who want to enter fashion world | Page Six
text:
New York Fashion Week creator Fern Mallis may have moved on from her public feud with rapper and Yeezy designer Kanye West , but she’s still wary of celebs crossing over into fashion.
“Celebrities get everything easier,” she told us at FIT’s annual gala. “I wish more celebrities would work with fashion students and collaborate with them.”
She added, “Celebrities are not designers. It takes a lot of passion, time and money to be a good designer. It is hard, it is a killer business. Celebrities have the advantage, so why not put that power to good use?”
The event honored Macy’s boss Terry Lundgren. In 2015, Mallis dared to declare, “I’m kind of over Kanye,” which sent West off on one of his usual Twitter rants.
